Interventional Pulmonology Procedure Note (Synthetic)

Date of Procedure: 05/10/2022
Patient: Fisher, Sarah

INDICATION: Airway inspection and therapeutic bronchoscopy.

SURGEON: Jordan Parks, MD
ASSISTANT: Michael Manson, DO
ANESTHESIOLOGIST: Taylor Reed, MD

DESCRIPTION OF PROCEDURE:
Following intravenous medications as per the record, the T190 video bronchoscope was introduced through the ETT.
At the distal edge of the stent there was some minor granulation tissue which was nonobstructive.
Cryotherapy was then performed with 30 second freeze/thaw cycles to induce tissue sloughing.
Finally, a total of 5 mL of Kenalog 10 mg/mL solution was injected into the submucosa.

RECOMMENDATIONS:
1. Follow up in about a week.

________________________________________
Jonathan Lee, MD Interventional Pulmonology
Date/Time: 03/15/2025 11:15
Electronically Signed
